text: Ceroplesis burgeoni is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Breuning in 1935. It is known from the Democratic Republic of Congo.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis burgeoni. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1935
title: Ceroplesis burgeoni
